00013 #define GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    text, state) \
00015    CheckBox * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new CheckBox) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    variable->setText(text); \
00023    variable->setState(CheckBox::##state);
00024 
00025 #define GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00026    text, state) \
00027    GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX(variable, area, groupField, text, state) \
00028    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py)));
00029 
00030 #define GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00031    text, state) \
00032    GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX(variable, area, groupField, text, state) \
00033    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00034       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00035 
00036 #define GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00037    text, state) \
00038    GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX(variable, area, groupField, text, state) \
00039    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00040    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00041       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00042 
00043 #define GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00044    text, state) \
00045    GLAZIERY_CHECKBOX(variable, area, groupField, text, state) \
00046    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00047    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00048
